backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a social platform backend with user registration/authentication, profiles, contacts, messaging, and shared media, using access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the dark neon theme restoration feature, listing all affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each page, component, and hook.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS entry point defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the shadcn-ui design token system (backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, chart colors, sidebar).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app titled 'ShareServe', mounting the app at the `#root` div and loading `src/main.tsx` as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with a `RootLayout` wrapper that renders `Layout` around all routes, including public (login/register) and protected (home, profile, chat, etc.) routes.
Reusable heading component supporting three neon animation variants—shimmer (gradient text), glow (cyan text shadow pulse), and typewriter—using CSS custom properties for neon colors.
frontend/src/components/DailyChallengeWi: Widget that displays a deterministic daily AI image prompt (selected by day-of-year from a preset list) with a neon-styled 'Use This Prompt' button that calls an `onUsePrompt` callback.
frontend/src/components/DesignCustomizer: A React component that renders a design customization panel allowing users to select color palettes, print sizes, finishes, quantity, and custom text, emitting changes via a callback prop.
frontend/src/components/ImageGenerator.t: A React component that generates images from a text prompt by trying multiple external image sources (Pollinations, Picsum, Unsplash) in sequence, with options to download, save, or add the result to a cart.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: A top-level layout component that renders a responsive sidebar/bottom-nav with navigation links, user auth controls, and notification badges, hiding navigation on public routes like login and register.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: A chat message input component with an auto-resizing textarea that sends messages on Enter key or button click, with a loading spinner state and neon-styled send button.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: A component that renders a list of chat messages, visually distinguishing sent vs. received messages with different bubble styles and displaying timestamps.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: A photo gallery component that loads and displays images from ExternalBlob objects with multi-level fallback URLs, a loading skeleton, and a lightbox modal for zoomed viewing.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUploader.ts: A photo upload component that lets users select an image file, preview it, and share it via the `useSharePhoto` mutation with upload progress tracking and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/StoriesRow.tsx: Renders a horizontal scrollable row of avatar buttons for all users except the current one, opening a `StoryViewerModal` when clicked.
frontend/src/components/StoryViewerModal: A fullscreen modal overlay that displays a user's profile info (avatar initials, display name, bio) with an auto-advancing progress bar animation that closes the modal on completion.
frontend/src/components/SuggestedUsers.t: Displays up to 5 suggested users (not already contacts) with an 'Add' button that sends a contact request via `useSendContactRequest`.
frontend/src/components/TrendingTopics.t: Renders a list of hardcoded trending hashtag buttons with neon colors that navigate to the search page with the selected topic on click.
frontend/src/components/VideoFactsCarous: An auto-advancing carousel that cycles through a set of hardcoded interesting facts every 6 seconds, with manual prev/next navigation and dot indicators.
frontend/src/components/VideoGallery.tsx: Displays a grid of video players from `ExternalBlob` sources, with fallback to public MP4 URLs if the primary source fails to load.
frontend/src/components/VideoGenerator.t: React component that generates videos from text prompts by mapping keywords to curated Mixkit MP4 URLs, with download and share functionality.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploader.ts: React component for selecting and uploading a video file, showing a preview and upload progress before sharing it via the backend mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Simple auth hook that persists a username to localStorage and exposes login/logout helpers along with an isAuthenticated flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/clear functions and status flags for ICP-based authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationCounts: Hook that returns notification counts (pending contact requests and a placeholder unread message count) for the current user.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including auth, user profiles, contacts, messaging, and video sharing mutations/queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Hook that loads, persists, and exposes app settings (dark mode, notifications, autoplay) from localStorage with update and toggle helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Orbitron fonts, sets up Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for a dark neon-themed design system, and provides utility classes for neon text/border/glow effects and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack Query's QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserPage.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat page component that displays a contacts sidebar and a conversation area, allowing users to select contacts and exchange messages using custom query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Contacts management page with three tabs—My Contacts, Requests, and Find People—supporting contact search, sending/accepting/declining contact requests, and displaying suggested users.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Content creation page with four tabs for AI image generation, AI video generation, photo upload, and video upload, plus a daily challenge widget that can pre-fill the image generator prompt.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizeDesignPage.t: Design customization page that lets users configure size, finish, color palette, quantity, and custom text for a generated AI image before proceeding to a purchase confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner with the user's name, a stories row, quick-action grid cards for Create/Discover/Chat/Contacts, and trending topics with suggested users sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login form that authenticates users via the backend actor's `loginUser` method and redirects to the home page on success. Includes neon-styled UI with username/password fields and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's profile with avatar, display name, bio, and tabbed photo/video galleries. Supports inline editing of display name and bio via `useUpdateUserProfile`.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows an order summary for a customized AI-generated design (pulled from sessionStorage) and handles purchase completion by saving the image to the user's profile via `useSharePhoto`. Displays a success screen after purchase.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Renders a registration form that calls the backend actor's `registerUser` method and logs the user in on success. Validates required fields, password length, and matching passwords before submission.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a search interface with tabbed photo and video results sourced from static Picsum and Mixkit URLs, filtered by a text query. Includes a lightbox for photo previews.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page that displays account info, toggleable preferences (dark mode, notifications, autoplay), an about section, and a logout button using useAuth and useSettings hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based semantic colors, neon color variants, Orbitron/Inter fonts, neon box shadows, and custom keyframe animations like shimmer and glow-pulse.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 29) describing ShareServe's features, architectural constraints, and known issues such as broken auth, non-rendering media, and broken AI generators.
